languages.text: "Он пал, когда вместо боевых соратников стал слушать нашептывания иссохшей гадюки. Какой позор для воина!"

traits.locale_text: "Он пал, когда вместо боевых соратников стал слушать нашептывания иссохшей гадюки. Какой позор для воина!"

languages.text: "He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"
languages.original_text: "Он пал, когда вместо боевых соратников стал слушать нашептывания иссохшей гадюки. Какой позор для воина!"

traits.locale_text: "He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. What a shame for a warrior!"
"He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. What a shame for a warrior!"
"He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"
"He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"
"He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"
"He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"

languages.text: 「戦友の声ではなく、干からびた毒蛇の囁きに耳を傾けた時点で、彼はすでに堕ちていた。戦士にあるまじき恥だ！」
languages.original_text: "He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"

traits.locale_text: 「戦友の声ではなく、干からびた毒蛇の囁きに耳を傾けた時点で、彼はすでに堕ちていた。戦士にあるまじき恥だ！」

languages.text: "Er ist gefallen, als er entschieden hat, auf das Flüstern einer vertrockneten Viper zu hören statt auf seine Waffenbrüder. Eine Schande für einen Krieger!"
languages.original_text: "He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"

traits.locale_text: "Er ist gefallen, als er entschieden hat, auf das Flüstern einer vertrockneten Viper zu hören statt auf seine Waffenbrüder. Eine Schande für einen Krieger!"

languages.text: « Le maréchal s'est condamné dès l'instant où il a choisi d'écouter les murmures d'une vipère flétrie au lieu de ses frères d'armes. Une honte pour un guerrier ! »
languages.original_text: "He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"

traits.locale_text: « Le maréchal s'est condamné dès l'instant où il a choisi d'écouter les murmures d'une vipère flétrie au lieu de ses frères d'armes. Une honte pour un guerrier ! »

languages.text: «Cayó en el momento en que decidió escuchar los susurros de una víbora arrugada en vez de a sus camaradas de batalla. ¡Qué deshonra para un guerrero!».
languages.original_text: "He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"

traits.locale_text: «Cayó en el momento en que decidió escuchar los susurros de una víbora arrugada en vez de a sus camaradas de batalla. ¡Qué deshonra para un guerrero!».

languages.text: “当他不相信战友的判断，而是听从那条干瘪毒蛇的低语时，他就已经倒下了。对战士而言，这简直是莫大的耻辱！”
languages.original_text: "He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"

traits.locale_text: “当他不相信战友的判断，而是听从那条干瘪毒蛇的低语时，他就已经倒下了。对战士而言，这简直是莫大的耻辱！”

languages.text: "Silah arkadaşların yerine sinsi bir yılanı dinlemeyi seçerek kendi sonunu getirmiş oldu. Bir savaşçı için ne büyük hezimet!"
languages.original_text: "He fell the moment he chose to heed the whispers of a shrivelled viper instead of his battle comrades. Such disgrace for a warrior!"
